title: S2 Ep49: Wealth taxes

description: Few countries tax their citizens' wealth annually, but Switzerland is one of them. Marius Br√ºlhart tells Tim Phillips about a natural experiment in Switzerland's cantons that teaches us about how people would respond if more countries decided to tax wealth instead of income.
